Key Match Events: Demiral scored in the 1st and 59th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Turkey will be without key player Hakan Calhanoglu for the last-16 game against Austria
Montella paid tribute to Calhanoglu for his 'extraordinary goal'
Turkey will feel the absence of some players in the Austria match
Austria is a team worthy of great admiration
Post-Match Reflections: Montella expressed relief that Turkey qualified for the knockout stage
Montella hopes that Turkey's success will relieve some pressure
Miscellaneous Highlights: Turkey booked their spot in the knockout stage of Euro 2024 with a 2-1 success over the Czech Republic
Turkey finished second in Group F
Turkey will take on either Romania or Netherlands in the quarter-finals if they navigate past Austria
Others: The match was an ill-tempered affair with 16 yellow and two red cards issued by the referee
Turkey's run to the semi-finals of Euro 2008 is their best-ever performance in the competition
